name: Joint Temporal Custody
description:
Joint Temporal Custody is a retro puzzle platformer where you share the controls with time.

Complete all 30 levels!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys + Space

Engine:  Unity

Sprite Editor:  Paint.net

SFX Maker:  bfxr.net

Music: "She Is My Best Treasure" by Rolemusic
